name: MovieDB
short: Fetch various info about a movie or TV series.
description: Fetch various info about a movie or TV series from The Movie DB API.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Hi, thanks for installing this cog. Please note, this cog requires a free API key from themoviedb.org.
Follow the TMDB docs for how to get your API key:
<https://developers.themoviedb.org/3/getting-started/introduction>

Once you have the key, you can then set it in your redbot instance with:
```[p]set api tmdb api_key <api_key>```
author: ow0x
